subject: Books and Literature
Steroids
lead_paragraph: HBO Films is planning to turn a best-selling book about Barry Bonds’s alleged steroid use and the government’s probe into the use of performance-enhancing drugs in sports, into a film.
snippet: HBO Films is planning to turn a best-selling book about Barry Bonds’s alleged steroid use and the government’s probe into the use of performance-enhancing drugs in sports, into a film.
